title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 17 - Transfer Of Patients
content:

State Regulations
§ 17.1 - Who may request transfer
§ 17.2 - Content of request
§ 17.3 - Issuance of order
§ 17.4 - Approval of transfer without order
§ 17.5 - Transfer of patients admitted in accordance with section 31.39 of the mental hygiene law
§ 17.6 - Other orders of transfer
§ 17.7 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 17

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§7.09, 9.01, 13.07, 13.09[b], 16.00, 19.07[a], 29.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
